#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		long long int i,sum=0,num,count=0,num1;
		//char a[101]={0};
		//cin>>a;
		cin>>num;
		num1 = num;
		while(num1!=0)
		{
			sum = num1 % 10;
			num1 = num1/10;
			count = count + sum;
			
		}
	
		/*long long int n = strlen(a);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			sum = sum + a[i];
		}*/
		long long int mul = pow(2,count);
		long long int ans = mul*num;
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
}
